trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around March 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a nurse who works the 3:p.m.- 11:p.m. shift. I had come home around 11:30 ish and was watching t.v. in my bedroom. My t.v. in my bedroom sits on my dresser, behind the dresser is two skylights, one directly behind my television.Between 2:20 & 2:30 or so I saw a bright, round glowing object fly at an incredible speed past my skylight in a downward trajectory towards the water across the street from my house. It was going (I think, not too good with directions)but from my vantage point,south to north. I live on a cove and it was headed straight that way.By the time I got up and went to the window it had disappeared. I know it wasn't a shooting star (seen a few of those before) but maybe a comet? or an asteroid? Don't know therefore it is unidentified. It "caught" my eye because it was so bright in the night sky and FAST!!My feeling and emotions were stunned amazement and excitemant with a Large dose of curiosity.
